pages.text: We provide Pocket Computer upgrades for the following peripherals:$(li)$(9)$(l:peripherals/environment_detector)Environment Detector$(/l)$()$(li)$(9)$(l:peripherals/player_detector)Player Detector$(/l)$()$(li)$(9)$(l:peripherals/chat_box)Chat Box$(/l)$()$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/items/pocket_computer/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!
Simply combine these with a pocket computer to add the peripheral to it. Note that you can't use the associated events.
